header: The Perl Weekly a 'Media Partner' YAPC::EU, that will be in August Kiev. This means you'll see me mention it a couple of time as the announce important milestones. Before YAPC::EU, there are going to be 5 Perl Workshops and YAPC::NA as well. The Workshop I have not mentioned yet are the Dutch Perl Workshop on April 19 in Arnhem and the Polish Perl Workshop in Warsaw on 25-26 May. If you are near-by, make sure you attend these events.
There was a huge debate with lots of comments and blog post trying to figure out the future of Perl. I linked to a few, but I try not comment.

chapters.title: The great new Email::Sender
chapters.text: RJBS released a new release of the module after converting it from Moose to Moo and saving 80% of the run-time for the test suite. The post comes with explanation how can you configure it to make it super easy to test your e-mail sending application, without actually sending the e-mails.
